actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make a technical correction relating to the harbor maintenance tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the harbor maintenance tax shall not be imposed in cases involving the transportation of passengers for compensation or hire on trips: (1) originating on the U.S. mainland and ending in Hawaii, Alaska, or a U.S. possession; or (2) originating in Hawaii, Alaska, or a U.S. possession and ending on the U.S. mainland.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make a technical correction relating to the harbor maintenance tax.
